document.full_text: vice president joe biden and top lawmakers will examine government-run health plans on tuesday as they try to work out a deal to raise the united states' borrowing authority, a congressional aide said.
document.title: joe biden group to tackle medicare and medicaid: aide
lines_and_colors: vice president joe biden and top lawmakers will examine government-run health plans on tuesday as they try to work out a deal to raise the united states' borrowing authority, a congressional aide said.
